knimeNode.name: Labeling Converter
knimeNode.shortDescription: Converts a given input from one dataformat into the other

fullDescription.intro: Converts a given labeling from one data format into the other

tab.name: Options
tab.option: Select the type here in which the images should be converted.
How the image pixel will be organised in the memory. May have impact on the runtime of algorithms. BYPASS_FACTORY uses the storage strategy from the original image.
